thread.title: Gordon Haugh
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Gordon Haugh

author: Gordon Haugh
title: Gordon Haugh
text:
The shopping experience on the web-site was good with no hassle.
Kept me informed on all stages of the purchase after the order was placed.
Delivery was prompt, considering it was despatched from Denmark to the UK.
I would have preferred a more precise estimate of the time of delivery from the local courier (Royal Mail) rather than "sometime that day".
